name: Kingfisher Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was a quaint little B&B. Clean room, friendly owners, comfy bed with updated decor. Came with breakfast - nothing fancy, just simple stuff.
reviews.title: Nice Place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Walk to main town is a bit longer than 4 minutes. Was more like 10. Town is nice with fun pubs.
reviews.title: Charming B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Big Room!
Great place to stay
reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights in October. This is a charming B&B in Killarney. The owners were very charming and great hosts. Rooms were very clean, spacious and had a lovely comfortable bed. Nice clean modern bathrooms. Staying here was like being in your own home. There was a good choice for breakfast. Good location in walking distance to the centre of Killarney. I would recommend and would definitely stay here again if in Killarney.

This was by far our largest room during our two weeks in Ireland, also nearly the biggest shower. Donal and Ann were lovely, not even blinking when we showed up after 8 p.m. without reservations, and dripping from the rain. There was a 5 minute walk from the quiet neighborhood into the fun & busy town of Killarney. Donal helped us reserve a tour of the Ring of Kerry, including pickup, and Ann took care of several loads of laundry for us, as there was no self-service laundry in town due a recent fire. Take note of the name - the Kingfisher is more like an inn than a small B&B, with less interaction with the other patrons. Our hosts gave us detailed advice on local attractions, restaurant recommendations, and were generally very good tour guides for this fascinating area.
reviews.title: Wonderful place

description: A genuine Irish welcome from Donal and Ann Carroll awaits you at our family run LONELY PLANET 2010/2011/2012 RECOMMENDED AND Michelin award winners. Ideally located in a quiet area a mere 4 minutes walk to Killarney Town Centre / and bus /rail station we have private parking and all rooms have complimentary WI-FI. Sat Tv and tea /coffee facilities. All Tours and golf tee times, fishing and walking can be arranged with Donal, a qualified Guide. Extensive breakfast buffet and menu with vegetarian options also , Special dietary requirements catered for. KERRY AIRPORT 15 KM TRANSPORT CAN BE ARRANGED.
